solution_line_template: She gets {wax_from_large_candle} ounces of wax from a {large_candle_oz} ounce candle because {large_candle_oz} x {original_wax_left_percent} = <<{large_candle_oz}*{original_wax_left_percent}={wax_from_large_candle}>>{wax_from_large_candle}

She gets {total_wax_from_large_candles} ounces total from these candles because {num_large_candles} x {wax_from_large_candle} = <<{num_large_candles}*{wax_from_large_candle}={total_wax_from_large_candles}>>{total_wax_from_large_candles}

She gets {wax_from_medium_candle} ounces of wax from each {medium_candle_oz} ounce candle because {medium_candle_oz} x {original_wax_left_percent} = <<{medium_candle_oz}*{original_wax_left_percent}={wax_from_medium_candle}>>{wax_from_medium_candle}

She gets {total_wax_from_medium_candles} ounces total from these candles because {num_medium_candles} x {wax_from_medium_candle} = <<{num_medium_candles}*{wax_from_medium_candle}={total_wax_from_medium_candles}>>{total_wax_from_medium_candles}

She gets {wax_from_small_candle} ounces from each {small_candle_oz} ounce candle because {small_candle_oz} x {original_wax_left_percent} = <<{small_candle_oz}*{original_wax_left_percent}={wax_from_small_candle}>>{wax_from_small_candle}

She gets {total_wax_from_small_candles} ounces from these candles because {num_small_candles} x {wax_from_small_candle} = <<{num_small_candles}*{wax_from_small_candle}={total_wax_from_small_candles}>>{total_wax_from_small_candles}
